attributes.action: Keep MP's sitting min 12h/day, 7day/week until a decision is made on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The current antiquated Parliamentary process coupled with the lack of leadership in the main parties is getting us no-where.  If it was a family or business crisis of a similar relative magnitude it would get resolved by people working really hard to resolve it.  By working 12 hours/day 7 days a week it would restore some of the detachment between MP's and ordinary people
attributes.background: Achieve this by require them to vote on all credible options in rounds and removing the least popular each time until there is a majority.  Any MP abstaining in any round would loose the right to vote in future rounds.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what options you would like MPs to vote on. In particular, we aren't sure how you would define a "credible option".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the options you would like Parliament to vote on.
